recipesJson.name: Honey Pear
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description:
This is just another Honey Pearry-inspired tweaked for my taste, perfect for those who find too much honeydew to be soapy or too much honeysuckle to be perfumy, but still enjoy the flavor of both.  

Edit: Only mix this recipe if you lack all of the ingredients to make "Honey Sucker" by @Fear as that recipe is a far superior version of the profile.
